Class CalendarOutputter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class CalendarOutputter
extends AbstractOutputter
     $Id$ [Apr 5, 2004]
    Writes an iCalendar model to an output stream.
    Author:
    Ben Fortuna

        Outputs an iCalender string to the specified output stream.
        Parameters:
